titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Rice University's University Relations Audio-Video records, 1962-2005 UA 126

publicationstmt.publisher: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

note.p: Stored off-site at the Library Service Center. Please request this material via woodson@rice.edu or call 713-348-2586.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-04-02 02:19:36 -0500.

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.corpname: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

did.unittitle: Rice University's University Relations Audio-Video records
did.abstract: Audio and video related to the daily work of the Rice University Office of University Relations.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Office of University Relations at Rice University, also known as Public Affairs, is charged with collaborating closely with local organizations and individuals to communicate Rice's plans and priorities to our Houston neighbors while also striving to understand what's most important to them and share that perspective with university leaders.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection includes audio and video related to the daily work of the Office of University Relations. Much of the material was created by Rice University, and in some cases by other Houston entities.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Stored off-site at the Library Service Center. Please request this material via woodson@rice.edu or call 713-348-2586.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This material is open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Rice University's University Relations Audio-Video records, 1962-2005, UA 126, Woodson Research Center, Fondren, Library, Rice University

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from this material must be facilitated through the Woodson Research Center.
